meanings.definition: A discoloration of the skin caused by injury
meanings.sent1: She had colorful bruises on her arm from the fall.
meanings.sent2: The bruises on his face showed where he had been hit.
meanings.sent3: The rainbow bruises on her leg made her look like a walking art project.
meanings.sent4: The bruises on the apple indicated it was overripe.
meanings.sent5: The bruises on the peach were like little purple kisses.

meanings.definition: To injure without breaking the skin
meanings.sent1: He bruises easily, so he avoids rough sports.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to bruise the fruit when picking it.
meanings.sent3: She playfully tried to bruise his ego with her teasing.
meanings.sent4: His harsh words bruised her feelings deeply.
meanings.sent5: The harsh criticism bruised his confidence.

meanings.sent1: The storm bruises the delicate flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Please handle the fragile items carefully to avoid bruising them.
meanings.sent3: His careless actions bruised their friendship.
meanings.sent4: The negative comments bruised her self-esteem.
meanings.sent5: The harsh treatment bruised the company's reputation.
